mapper.select: select ec_cattag_id as id,ec_cattag_name as name,ec_cattag_code as code from bd_techcat_dt where ec_cattag_status=0
select ec_cattag_id as id,ec_cattag_name as name,ec_cattag_code as code from bd_techcat_dt
select ec_cattag_id as id,ec_cattag_name as name,ec_cattag_code as code,ec_cattag_status as status from bd_techcat_dt where ec_cattag_id=#{id}
